item.title: Cloud On The Cheap
item.description:
Big corporations are shifting their data centers to the cloud for financial and logistical benefits, enabling work from anywhere. But what about smaller businesses? Can they enjoy similar advantages? One cloud solution often overlooked due to its existence before the cloud trend is GoToMyPC. Although not typically associated with the cloud, it embodies the concept. GoToMyPC enables remote login to your computer. But isn’t accessing your desktop from a restaurant, running office applications, conceptually similar to using a private cloud?..

item.title: Take Your Office PC With You
item.description:
Mobile professionals often rely on their laptops but might find themselves needing files left on their office desktops. Traveling long distances back for these files isn’t always feasible. Imagine accessing your office desktop from anywhere, anytime. This eliminates the worry of having the right files and removes the need for duplicates. item.title: G.ho.st as the Machine
item.description:
If you come across a platform called G.ho.st, don’t be spooked by the name. It stands for Global Hosted Operating SysTem, found at http://g.ho.st/. It’s essentially an online operating system.
